uploadDBDialog.title: Commit lyrics to AMLL Vault (Netease Cloud Music only)
uploadDBDialog.ncmOnlyWarning: This function is only for the users who use AMLL plugin for Netease Cloud Music. If you are making lyrics and plan to upload to other applications, please do so by their functions instead of here.
uploadDBDialog.content:
We appreciate your contributions of lyrics.
By uploading, you are agreed to {0} and upload your content to our database! 
And your content may be used as the default TTML lyrics by the plugin.
If you decided to keep your copyright of your content, please cancel.
Fill out the form and we are taking you to the issue page on Github.
uploadDBDialog.boldCC0: According to CC0 agreement, completely give up on the copyright of the content
uploadDBDialog.musicNameTip: Artist - Track, that's the recommended format.
uploadDBDialog.ncmID: Track ID on Netease Cloud Music
uploadDBDialog.ncmIDTip:
It is copiable by right click on the AMLL plugin on Netease Cloud Music and it should be digital.
If you are uploading the same lyrics to multiple tracks, please split IDs by comma(,)
uploadDBDialog.commentTip: Is there anything more we should know about?

errors.noLyricContent: Nothing we found in the lyrics

tutorial.title: Welcome to Apple Music-like Lyrics TTML Tool
tutorial.content:
This TTML lyrics tool is designed for Apple Music-like Lyrics playing page of BetterNCM plugin.
We provide multiple functions for making various kinds of lyrics.
Check out our quick tutorial, we'll get you there soon:
tutorial.wipWarning: This tool is still in development, please always save your project.

step1.title: Load lyrics
step1.content:
Lyrics can be loaded by go to File->Upload lyrics file.
It is okay for lyrics in non-TTML format. LRC/YRC/QRC/Lyricify Syllable formats are acceptable.

step2.title: Edit lyrics
step2.content:
Click the {0} button to edit lyrics (by default).
You can append a new line, add new words, even split or edit them! 
Please notify that all space will be saved.
If you want to add translation or romaji, please enable by going to View->Show translation/romaji lyrics.
If you want to adjust lyrics property (toggle Background Voice or Duet), please right click or go to menu and choose from the list.
If you want to edit multiple lines at the same time, please check the lines, and go to menu.

step3.title: Sync Lyrics
step3.content:
Click the {0} button to enable Sync Mode.
Load your music from file below then start syncing.
You can also slowdown the track if it goes too fast.
These are the default keymap of syncing mode: 
{1}

moveToFirstWordOfPreviousLine.description: Move to the first word of the last line

moveToFirstWordOfNextLine.description: Move to the first word of the next line

moveToPreviousWordAndCurrentTime.description: Move back to last word, and set the current timestamp as the starting of it

moveToNextWordAndSetCurrentTime.description: Move back to next word, and set the current timestamp as the starting of it

setWordStartTimeToCurrentTime.description: Set current timestamp as the starting of word

moveNextAndSetWordTime.description: Set current timestamp as the ending of current word and starting of next word, and move to next word

moveNextAndSetWordEndTimeOnly.description: Set current timestamp as the ending of current word, and move to next word (used to make instrumental time)

step4.title: Save Lyrics
step4.content:
You can save lyrics as TTML format, as well as other mainstream formats.
BUT please remind that currently, translation and romaji will not be saved as Lyricify Syllable. Translations, rumaji and syllable timestamps will not be saved as LRC. Translations, romaji and lyrics property will not be saved as YRC/QRC.

step5.title: Use Lyrics (Only Netease Cloud Music)
step5.ncmOnlyWarning: This step is only for users who use AMLL NetEase Cloud plugin, if you are editing lyrics to use lyrics on other software, please refer to the corresponding software to import and use lyrics to use lyrics!
step5.content:
The last thing to do is to put it in the TTML lyrics folder of the AMLL plugin, name the lyrics file as the song ID of the Netease cloud (you can get it by right-clicking and copying it in the AMLL play page) and then cut the song again to read it!
In order for more people to experience the effects of TTML lyrics, you can also upload your lyrics to {0} for download!

tutorial.ending: Afterwards you can revisit this page via the File->About->Quick Tutorial, or come back to it if you have forgotten how to do it!

common.languageDesc: Select the language for the interface

layoutModeDesc.line1: Simple layout satisfies most basic needs
layoutModeDesc.line2: Switch to Advanced Mode if you need more efficient syncing

common.syncJudgeModeDesc: Set how timestamps are judged when syncing. Default is 'First key down'.

submitToAMLLDB.description: Submit lyrics to AMLL Lyrics Database
submitToAMLLDB.title: Submit lyrics to AMLL Lyrics Database (Simplified Chinese users only)
submitToAMLLDB.chineseOnlyWarning: This feature is only available to Simplified Chinese users of AMLL Lyrics Database. If you are editing lyrics to use them in other software, please follow that software's way to submit lyrics!
submitToAMLLDB.thankYou: First of all, thank you for your generous lyrics contribution!
submitToAMLLDB.cc0Rights: use the CC0 license and fully waive ownership of the lyrics
submitToAMLLDB.andSubmit: and submit to the lyrics database!
submitToAMLLDB.futureUse: And the lyrics will be used as default TTML source by AMLL systems in the future!
submitToAMLLDB.rightsWarning: If you value retaining ownership, please do NOT submit!
submitToAMLLDB.submitInstructions: Enter the following info then jump to the GitHub issue submission page!
